data.title: Robin Wright
authors: Contributors to Ultimate Soap Fan Wiki
data.meta_description: Robin Wright appeared on daytime as Kelly Capwell on Santa Barbara. While still appearing on Santa Barbara, Wright landed the role of Princess Buttercup in The Princess Bride. Wright has had an extensive career since leaving daytime most recently appearing on the Netflix series House of Cards...
data.text:
Full Name

Robin Virginia Gayle Wright

Birthdate

April 8, 1966

Birthplace

Dallas, Texas, USA

Children

2

Occupation

Actress

Years Active

1984-1988

Robin Wright appeared on daytime as Kelly Capwell on Santa Barbara. While still appearing on Santa Barbara, Wright landed the role of Princess Buttercup in The Princess Bride. Wright has had an extensive career since leaving daytime most recently appearing on the Netflix series House of Cards.

Personal Life[]

Wright was married to Sean Penn (1996-2010) and they had two children: Dylan Frances (b. 04/13/1991) and Hopper Jack (b. 08/06/1993). Wright was also married to Dane Witherspoon (1986-1988).

Soapography[]

Kelly Capwell on Santa Barbara (1984-1988)
